content:
Hello. I was working on PR https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/pull/9702, but it unfortunately got blocked.
Is there any other beginner friendly issue that I could try to tackle? Thanks.

I'm not at all familiar with the issue tracker on the cargo repo, but it does look like there's a label for "easy" issues which might be a good place to start: https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3AE-easy

Yeah, I saw those. Unfortunately, all 3 issues listed there are already claimed and are actively worked on.
I was hoping that the cargo team had something else not properly tagged or without a written issue right now.
